oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Some observations on the hydrogen embrittlement of Fe3Al-Fe3AlC intermetallic compounds
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, VS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: oxidation behavior
carbon
alloys
temperature
carbides
intermetallic compounds
electron microscopy
scanning auger electron spectroscopy (aes)
microstructure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Effects of carbon on the hydrogen embrittlement behaviour of Fe3Al intermetallic compounds were observed by revealing its microstructure. In low-carbon content (0.05 wt.%) alloy embrittlement was found in the Fe3Al phase, in moderate level of carbon content (0.14-0.5 wt.%) there was no embrittlement in the alloy, whereas in high level of carbon content (1 wt.%) embrittlement was found in the interdendritic region. (C) 2003
